name: Xiaomitool
tagline: An OpenSource toolkit for Xiaomi devices
body:
### XiaomiTool.
XiaomiTool is an OpenSource Toolkit that has the goal to provide a safe, easy and user-friendly interface to manage your Xiaomi Device.

###Supported Devices
* Xiaomi Mi 2 [aries]
* Xiaomi Mi 2S [aries]
* Xiaomi Mi 3W [cancro]
* Xiaomi Mi 4W [cancro]
* Xiaomi RedMi 1S [armani]


### Features
* Backup and Restore the device
* Push files
* Import camera photos
* Change RunTime
* Record Screen
* Shell on device
* Install Apps
* Root (both MiUi stable and Custom roms)
* Install a custom Recovery
* Flash Zip files
* Install Roms
* Reboot
* Fork Bomb


### Authors and Contributors
@linuxxxxx

### Support or Contact
Bug report [Github Issue Tracker](https://github.com/linuxxxxx/XiaomiTool/issues/)

Mail Support [@linuxx](mailto:io.nolinuxnoparty@gmail.com)
